subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In most years, the Yankees are the team that wreaks havoc on the free-agent marketplace. But this off-season, they are seeing the market price them out of the most attractive deals.
snippet: In most years, the Yankees are the team that wreaks havoc on the free-agent marketplace. But this off-season, they are seeing the market price them out of the most attractive deals.
